category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: By enabling this option the user online list will be displayed on the c4w start page.
Count only registered users in user online record
Should only registered users be counted to calculate the user online record?
Show legend of usergroups under user online list
By enabling this option a legend of usergroups is displayed. There are only those usergroups displayed which have a special formatting. You will find the settings at "Edit usergroups".

category.name: c4w.global
category.item: Basis: Community Framework™{if SHOW_VERSION_NUMBER} {@WCF_VERSION}{/if}, developed by WoltLab® GmbH
